name: Finny Fish (Fight for Freedom)
description:
Little Timmy has clogged the toilet and now the room is all flooded! This is the perfect opportunity for Finny the fish to make his daring escape to freedom~ Help him avoid and fight his way through obstacles so he can begin his journey to deep blue sea. But first, to the sink!

Use "WASD/arrow keys" to move. Use "SPACEBAR" to shoot.

Press "X" to return to the Menu Screen.
